body.p: includes some basic support for working with JSON Lines documents. JSON Lines is a convenient format for storing structured data that may be processed one record at a time.

section.title: Editing JSON Lines Documents
section.p: You can edit JSON Lines documents in the Text mode editor in and you have access to its various features and actions that are common for basic text files.

section.title: Validation
section.p: Validation support is available for JSON Lines documents if you have associated a schema through a configured validation scenario.

section.title: Content Completion
section.p: Content completion support is also available for JSON Lines documents if you have associated a schema through a configured validation scenario.
